description: Modern Times Group MTG AB engages as an entertainment company. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 970 full-time employees.  The firm operates in two segments: Esport and Gaming. The Esport segment is made up of ESL, Dreamhack and MTG VC-fund’s investments in esport related companies. Through ESL and Dreamhack,the Company operates national and international tournaments as well as grassroots amatuer cups, leagues and festivals. The Gaming segment is made up of InnoGames, Kongregate and MTG VC-fund’s investment in gaming-related companies. InnoGames is publisher of mobile and on-line games. InnoGames’ complete portfolio encompasses seven live games and several mobile titles in production. InnoGames is focused on the free-to-play segment and provides players with a cross-platform experience on PC and mobile devices. Kongregate is mobile game publisher and developer. The firm operates worldwide.
name: Modern Times Group MTG AB
